00065 class DF_MeanSquaredError : virtual public ModelInterface {
00066  public:
00067 
00068 //===========================================================================
00100  double error(const Array<double> &input, const Array<double> &target) {
00101     double se = 0;
00102     if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00103       Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00104       model(input, output);
00105       for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++) {
00106         se += (target(c) - output(c)) * (target(c) - output(c));
00107       }
00108     } else {
00109       Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00110       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00111         model(input[pattern], output);
00112         for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++) {
00113           se += (target(pattern, c) - output(c)) * (target(pattern, c) - output(c));
00114         }
00115       }
00116     }
00117     // normalise
00118     se /= target.nelem();
00119     return se;
00120   }
00121 
00122 //===========================================================================
00155   double derror(const Array<double> &input, const Array<double> &target, bool returnError=true) {
00156     dedw = 0;
00157     double se = 0;
00158 
00159     if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00160       output.resize(target.dim(0));
00161       locerr.resize(output.nelem(), false);
00162 
00163       model(input, output);
00164       for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++) {
00165         if (returnError)
00166           se += (target(c) - output(c)) * (target(c) - output(c));
00167         locerr(c) = (target(c) - output(c));
00168       }
00169       df(locerr, dedw);
00170     } else {
00171       output.resize(target.dim(1));
00172       locerr.resize(output.nelem(), false);
00173 
00174       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00175         model(input[pattern], output);
00176         for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++) {
00177           if(returnError)
00178             se += (target(pattern, c) - output(c)) * (target(pattern, c) - output(c));
00179           locerr(c) = (target(pattern,c) - output(c));
00180         }
00181         df(locerr, dedw);
00182       }
00183     }
00184     // normalise
00185     dedw *= 2. / target.nelem();
00186     if (returnError)
00187       se /= target.nelem(); 
00188     else 
00189       se = -1;
00190     return se;
00191   }
00192   Array<double> output;
00193   Array<double> locerr;
00194 };
